mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( user_code, login_name, login_password, user_name, user_phone, user_qq, user_head_url, user_sex, user_signature, status, create_time ) values ( #{userCode}, #{loginName}, #{loginPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userQq}, #{userHeadUrl}, #{userSex.value}, #{userSignature}, #{status.value}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_qq = #{userQq}, user_head_url = #{userHeadUrl}, user_sex = #{userSex.value}, user_signature = #{userSignature}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user = #{updateUser} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select user_id userId, user_code userCode, login_name loginName, user_name userName, user_phone userPhone, user_qq userQq, user_head_url userHeadUrl, user_sex userSex, user_signature userSignature from sys_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select su.user_id userId, su.user_code userCode, su.login_name loginName, su.login_password loginPasswork, su.status status from sys_user su where su.login_name = #{loginName} and su.login_password = #{loginPassword}
